about_the_game:
A fangame for Touhou Project by ZUN

A short visual novel about 4 girls, one of whom will discover who they are.
Marisa rounds up a most unlikely crew, in search of adventure, and of course, treasure! Interpersonal conflict ensues among the crew, but in the end, their stark differences bring clarity to their personal lives. The real treasure is the one you find within yourself!

Featuring: Marisa, Sanae, Alice, and Satori.

But there will be a few more extra characters we meet along the way!

With 1 hidden character!

A story that features comedy, drama, romance, and heartfelt expressions of fear, shame, self-doubt, and love. Every route starts with warmth and humor and ends with something deeper and more intimate.

highlighted.name: The Girl Even the Vengeful Spirits Fear

A story that features comedy, drama, romance, and heartfelt expressions of fear, shame, self-doubt, and love. Every route starts with warmth and humor and ends with something deeper and more intimate.
legal_notice:
This is a fan game based on the Touhou video game series by Team Shanghai Alice.
We do not own the characters, setting, or name of any of these characters.
No assets were used from any of the official Touhou releases by Team Shanghai Alice or any collaboration with Team Shanghai Alice.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86_64/Arm
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7

  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10

  • Storage: 1 GB available space
